alert.note: Alert for Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 16 at 12:10PM EST until February 19 at 8:30PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh PA has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Pennsylvania...Ohio... Clarion River At Cooksburg affecting Jefferson PA, Forest and Clarion zones. Stillwater Creek At Uhrichsville affecting Tuscarawas County. Muskingum River At Coshocton affecting Coshocton County.
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/pbz. OHZ039-170300- /O.NEW.KPBZ.FL.A.0003.220218T1930Z-220220T0130Z/ /URVO1.0.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 1210 PM EST Wed Feb 16 2022 ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Stillwater Creek at Uhrichsville. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Stillwater Creek comes out of its banks in several locations resulting in overflowing in poor drainage areas. Minor flooding of low lying areas begins. At 11.5 feet, Flood waters of Stillwater Creek will reach the intersection of East 12th Street and North Main Street in Uhrichsville and approach Newport Street. Little Stillwater Creek will flood most of Phac Park along with portions of Wilson Road in Dennison. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
